title: MNAs repose full trust in prime ministerâ€™s leadership
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 23 (APP): Members of the National Assembly from Punjab and Sindh Wednesday called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here and reposed full trust in his leadership.
The parliamentarians who met the prime minister included Amir Liaquat Hussain, Alia Hamza and Saira Bano.
Federal Ministers Asad Umar and Ali Haider Zaidi, and Special Assistant to PM Amir Dogar also attended the meeting.
